descriptions.ageAbove100: Are you kidding me? You're more than 100 years old (and using Discord)! Try again with a valid age.
descriptions.ageBelow13: Sorry kid, you're not even allowed to use Discord until you turn 13.
descriptions.bastionMissingPermissions: I need %var% permission to run this command.
descriptions.bioRange: Bio should be fewer than %var% characters.
descriptions.channelNameLength: Channel name should be between %var% and %var% characters.
descriptions.channelNotFound: The specified channel was not found.
descriptions.claimCooldown: %var% you have recently claimed your daily reward, please try again tomorrow. You can claim daily rewards only once every day.
descriptions.commandUsage: That's not how you use the `%var%` command. See the usage below to know how to use the command.
descriptions.connection: Some error has occured while receiving data from the server. Please try again later.
descriptions.cooldown:
%var% you've recently used this command. Please try again later.
`%var%` command can only be used once in **%var%** minutes.
descriptions.serverNotFound:
Bastion cannot find the server at %var%.
• Check the address for typing errors such as **ww**.example.com instead of **www**.example.com
• Connection may have been timed out, try again later.
descriptions.eitherOneInVC: Either one of us should be in a voice channel.
descriptions.favSongsNotFound: There are no songs in your favourite songs list.
descriptions.gamblingCooldown: %var% you have recently gambled in this game, please wait at least %var% seconds before gambling again.
descriptions.giveLimit: You cannot give more than %var%% of your %_currencyName%.
descriptions.giveNoUser: You need to mention the user to whom you want to give %_currencyName%.
descriptions.indexRange: The index you entered is out of range.
descriptions.insufficientBalance: You do not have sufficient balance in your account. Your current account balance is *%var%* %currencySymbol%.
descriptions.invalidEmbedObject: The entered embed object is invalid. You can create an embed object [here](%bastionSite%/embedbuilder/).
descriptions.invalidInput: The *%var%* entered by you is not valid.
descriptions.invalidIPPort: Cannot get stats from the specified server. Please check the IP address and PORT number and if the server is online before trying again.
descriptions.invalidMusicChannel: I am not able to join the default voice channel. Either a wrong voice channel has been set or the voice channel has been deleted.
descriptions.invalidPlatform: You have entered an invalid platform. Valid platforms are: %var%.
descriptions.invalidRegion: You have entered an invalid region. Valid regions are: %var%.
descriptions.invalidRoleColor: The specified color is not available, please try one of these: ```%var%```
descriptions.isEventInUse: Cannot start the %var% event now. It is already running in this channel. Please wait for it to end.
descriptions.isGameInUse: Cannot start the %var% game now. It is already running in this channel. Please wait for it to end.
descriptions.isSpeaking: I am currently playing something in a voice channel. I cannot play another sound simultaneously.
descriptions.locationRange: Location should be fewer than %var% characters.
descriptions.lowerRole: You do not have permission to use this command on that role.
descriptions.messageNotFound: The specified message was not found.
descriptions.musicChannelNotFound: No default music channel has been set. And I need to be in a voice channel to be able to play.
descriptions.noDeletableMessage: No message was found that could be deleted.
descriptions.noLiveStream: No live stream found for the channel %var%.
descriptions.noPermission: I do not have permission to %var% %var%.
descriptions.notFound: No %var% was found for the specified parameters.
descriptions.notPlaying: No song is currently being played.
descriptions.parse: Some error has occured while parsing the received data. Please try again later.
descriptions.playerModeMismatch: Unable to find any stats for the player %var% in %var% game mode.
descriptions.prefixRange: Prefix should be fewer than %var% characters.
descriptions.profileNotCreated: %var%'s profile is not yet created. It will be created once they start texting.
descriptions.playlistNotFound: There are no songs in the specified playlist.
descriptions.isReminderInUse: You have already set a reminder. You can set only one reminder at once. Please wait for it to complete or run `%var%` to cancel the previous reminder.
descriptions.roleNameLength: Role name should be %var% or fewer in length.
descriptions.roleNotFound: The specified role was not found.
descriptions.selfDestructTimeout: Timeout should be between %var% and %var% seconds.
descriptions.singleMessage: Dude, you can delete a single message by yourself, right? You do not need me for that!
descriptions.takeNoUser: You need to mention the user or give their ID from whom you want to take %_currencyName%.
descriptions.unknown: Some unknown error has occured. Please check the console and report it to %bastion% Developers at %discordInvLink%.
descriptions.userNoMusicChannel: %var% you need to be in the default music channel, **%var%**, to use this command.
descriptions.userNoSameVC: %var% you need to be in the same voice channel as me to use this command.
descriptions.userNoVC: %var% you need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
descriptions.weatherNotFound: No weather data was found for the specified location.
